newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Czech prime minister to visit Singapore.
newsitem.headline: Czech prime minister to visit Singapore.

text.p: The prime minister of the Czech Republic, Vaclav Klaus, will make a working visit to Singapore on September 10, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Saturday.

A ministry statement said Klaus would be accompanied by senior officials, including the Deputy Minister and Head of the Prime Minister's Office, Jiri Weigl, as well as a 30-member business delegation.
He will tour the city and port and officially open the Czech Embassy in Singapore during his visit.
